classifierQuestions.question: Let's start with you. What's your role in the organization?
How would you describe your organization's relationship with AI today - just getting started, actively using it, or leading with it?
What's your biggest priority right now - improving efficiency, driving innovation, or transforming the business?

safety.text: Walk me through how data moves through your organization today. Where does it live and who can access it?
safety.followUp: What frustrates you most about your current data situation?

safety.text: Tell me about a time when bad data caused a problem. How did you discover it?
safety.followUp: How often does this kind of thing happen?

challenge.text: If you could see any data in real-time right now to make better decisions, what would it be and why?
challenge.followUp: What's stopping you from having that visibility today?

challenge.text: How do you know if your data is trustworthy? Give me a specific example.
challenge.followUp: Who owns data quality in your organization?

transformation.text: Imagine your data could predict problems before they happen. What would you want it to predict first?
transformation.followUp: How would that change your business model?

safety.text: How many different systems do you log into on a typical day? Walk me through them.
safety.followUp: Which ones talk to each other?

safety.text: Tell me about a time when systems not talking to each other caused issues.
safety.followUp: How did you work around it?

challenge.text: If all your systems could share data instantly, what would become possible that isn't today?
challenge.followUp: What's the biggest barrier to making that happen?

transformation.text: Describe your ideal technology ecosystem where everything just works together.
transformation.followUp: How far away are you from that vision?

safety.text: What keeps you up at night when it comes to AI and security?
safety.followUp: Have you had any close calls?

safety.text: How do you ensure sensitive data doesn't end up in AI systems where it shouldn't?
safety.followUp: Walk me through your process.

challenge.text: Tell me about your AI governance. Who decides what's safe to automate?
challenge.followUp: How do you document those decisions?

transformation.text: If security wasn't a constraint, how would you use AI differently?
transformation.followUp: What would it take to get there safely?

safety.text: Where does your AI processing happen today - on premises, in the cloud, or somewhere else?
safety.followUp: How did you decide on that approach?

challenge.text: What would need to change for you to run AI everywhere it's needed, not just where it's convenient?
challenge.followUp: What's the business case for that?

transformation.text: Imagine AI running at the edge of your operations in real-time. What becomes possible?
transformation.followUp: How would that transform your industry?

safety.text: How long does it take to go from AI idea to deployed solution in your organization?
safety.followUp: Walk me through a recent example.

challenge.text: What's your process for testing and deploying AI models? Who's involved?
challenge.followUp: Where does that process break down?

transformation.text: If you could deploy AI updates as easily as updating an app, what would you build first?
transformation.followUp: What impact would that velocity have?

safety.text: How do you currently measure the value of AI investments? Give me a specific example.
safety.followUp: Are you happy with those metrics?

safety.text: Tell me about an AI investment that didn't pay off as expected. What happened?
safety.followUp: What did you learn from that?

challenge.text: If AI could increase your margins by 20%, where would that improvement come from?
challenge.followUp: What would it take to capture that value?

transformation.text: Imagine AI creating entirely new revenue streams for you. What might those look like?
transformation.followUp: How much could that be worth?

safety.text: How are your competitors using AI differently than you? What have you noticed?
safety.followUp: Does that worry you or excite you?

challenge.text: If you could know one thing about how your competitors use AI, what would it be?
challenge.followUp: How would that knowledge change your strategy?

transformation.text: How could AI help you create a market that doesn't exist today?
transformation.followUp: What would make you the obvious leader in that market?

safety.text: Where does AI currently touch your customer's journey? Walk me through it.
safety.followUp: How do customers feel about those interactions?

safety.text: Tell me about a time AI improved a customer interaction. What made it better?
safety.followUp: Could you replicate that elsewhere?

challenge.text: What do your customers wish you could do that seems impossible today?
challenge.followUp: How might AI make that possible?

transformation.text: If AI could perfectly predict what each customer needs before they ask, how would your business change?
transformation.followUp: What would that do to customer loyalty?

safety.text: Which parts of your operations would benefit most from being smarter? Why those?
safety.followUp: What's stopping you from starting there?

challenge.text: If AI could eliminate your biggest operational headache, what would that be?
challenge.followUp: What would you do with the time saved?

transformation.text: Describe your operations if they were completely autonomous. What role would humans play?
transformation.followUp: How would that change your competitive position?

safety.text: How is AI changing what you offer to customers? Give me an example.
safety.followUp: Is that incremental or transformational?

challenge.text: What product or service could you create with AI that you couldn't before?
challenge.followUp: What's preventing you from building it?

transformation.text: If AI could invent your next breakthrough product, what problem would it solve?
transformation.followUp: How would that redefine your industry?

safety.text: How do your senior leaders talk about AI? Give me an example from a recent meeting.
safety.followUp: Do they walk the talk?

safety.text: Tell me about a leader in your organization who really 'gets' AI. What makes them different?
safety.followUp: How do you spread that mindset?

challenge.text: What would need to change for every leader to be an AI champion?
challenge.followUp: Who would resist and why?

transformation.text: Imagine your leadership team thinking AI-first in every decision. What becomes possible?
transformation.followUp: How would that change your culture?

safety.text: What AI skills do your teams have today versus what they need? Be specific.
safety.followUp: How are you closing that gap?

challenge.text: If you could instantly give your team one AI superpower, what would it be?
challenge.followUp: What would they do with it?

transformation.text: Describe your workforce when everyone is AI-fluent. What changes?
transformation.followUp: How do roles evolve?

safety.text: How are people in your organization learning about AI? Is it working?
safety.followUp: What would make it better?

challenge.text: What's the gap between AI training and actual AI usage in daily work?
challenge.followUp: How do you bridge that?

transformation.text: If learning was continuous and AI-powered, how would your organization evolve?
transformation.followUp: What would that unlock?

safety.text: How has AI changed how you measure and reward performance?
safety.followUp: Is that creating the right behaviors?

challenge.text: If AI could measure performance in real-time, what would you track differently?
challenge.followUp: How would that change motivation?

transformation.text: Imagine performance management that predicts and develops potential. What would that look like?
transformation.followUp: How would that transform your talent?

safety.text: How would you describe your culture's relationship with AI - fearful, curious, or excited?
safety.followUp: What shaped that attitude?

challenge.text: What cultural beliefs would need to shift for AI to truly thrive here?
challenge.followUp: How do you change those beliefs?

transformation.text: Describe your culture when AI augmentation is just how work gets done.
transformation.followUp: What values drive that culture?

safety.text: Tell me about a time you had to make an ethical decision about AI use. What guided you?
safety.followUp: Do you have clear principles for these decisions?

challenge.text: How do you ensure AI decisions are fair and unbiased? Give me an example.
challenge.followUp: How do you validate that?

transformation.text: What would ethical AI leadership look like in your industry?
transformation.followUp: How could you set that standard?

safety.text: Which AI regulations affect your business? How are you preparing?
safety.followUp: What worries you most?

challenge.text: How do you balance innovation speed with compliance requirements?
challenge.followUp: Where does that tension show up?

transformation.text: If you could shape AI regulation for your industry, what would you prioritize?
transformation.followUp: How would that enable innovation?

safety.text: Walk me through your AI vendor landscape. Who are your key partners?
safety.followUp: How do you evaluate them?

challenge.text: What capabilities do you wish your AI vendors offered that they don't today?
challenge.followUp: Have you told them?

transformation.text: If you could design the perfect AI partner ecosystem, what would it include?
transformation.followUp: How would that accelerate your transformation?

safety.text: What's the biggest risk of NOT adopting AI fast enough?
safety.followUp: How do you balance that with adoption risks?

challenge.text: Tell me about an AI risk that materialized. How did you handle it?
challenge.followUp: What would you do differently?

transformation.text: How could AI help you predict and prevent risks before they happen?
transformation.followUp: What would that mean for your resilience?

safety.text: How aligned is your organization on the AI vision? Give me evidence.
safety.followUp: Where do you see disconnect?

challenge.text: What would need to happen for everyone to row in the same AI direction?
challenge.followUp: Who needs to lead that?

transformation.text: Describe your organization when AI strategy and execution are perfectly synchronized.
transformation.followUp: What makes that possible?

safety.text: How do teams share AI learnings and successes? Give me an example.
safety.followUp: Is that systematic or ad-hoc?

challenge.text: What breaks down when teams try to collaborate on AI initiatives?
challenge.followUp: How do you fix that?

transformation.text: Imagine AI orchestrating perfect collaboration across all teams. What becomes possible?
transformation.followUp: How does that change your velocity?

safety.text: How quickly can your organization pivot when AI creates new opportunities? Give me an example.
safety.followUp: What slows you down?

challenge.text: What would need to change for you to adapt as fast as AI evolves?
challenge.followUp: Is that change happening?

transformation.text: Describe your organization as a living system that evolves with AI. What does that look like?
transformation.followUp: How do you build that capability?

safety.text: On a scale of 1-10, how ready is your organization for AI transformation? Why that number?
safety.followUp: What would make it a 10?

challenge.text: What's the gap between where you are and where you need to be with AI?
challenge.followUp: What's your plan to close it?

transformation.text: When you've fully transformed with AI, what will be fundamentally different about your organization?
transformation.followUp: How will the world know you've succeeded?

betweenDimensions: That's helpful context about [previous topic]. Now let's shift to [next topic]...
Building on what you just shared, I'm curious about [related area]...
That gives me a good picture of [area]. Let's explore how that connects to [next area]...
encouragement: That's exactly the kind of insight I was hoping for...
You're painting a clear picture here...
This is valuable - tell me more about that...
clarification: Let me make sure I understand - you're saying...
So if I'm hearing you correctly...

skipRules: If maturity > 6, skip all safety questions
If time > 30 minutes, move to wrap-up
If role = technical, emphasize technical dimensions
If industry = regulated, emphasize governance dimensions
depthRules: If resistance detected, acknowledge and reframe
